cock.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: A cock crowed in the distance.
cock.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: an adult male bird of any kind
cock.translation[0].definitions[1].examp: A cock pheasant rose from the hill in front of me.
cock.translation[0].definitions[3].defin: something that controls the flow of liquid or gas out of a pipe or container
cock.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: used by some people when talking to a man they know well
cock.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to lift a part of your body, or hold a part of your body at an angle
cock.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: She cocked her head and considered the offer.
He cocked a quizzical eyebrow at her.
cock.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to pull back the hammer of a gun so that it is ready to be fired
cock.translation[1].definitions[2].defin: to move your hat so that it is at an angle
